snippet.title: Planet Zoo: Barnyard Animal Pack | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience the charm of the countryside in Planet Zoo: Barnyard Animal Pack!

Buy Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2837730/Planet_Zoo_Barnyard_Animal_Pack/ 

Packed with personality and character, this collection includes the adventurous Alpine goat, known for its nimble hooves and indomitable spirit, the Sussex chicken with its energetic demeanor, and the sweet and curious alpaca.   

Alongside these exciting new additions, the pack also features 60+ rustic scenery pieces along with a new campaign scenario in which much loved characters return to transform a run-down farm into a successful animal haven for both your animals and guests to enjoy.  

For more news and information about Planet Zoo: 
Website: www.planetzoogame.com  
Facebook: www.facebook.com/PlanetZooGame   
Twitter: @PlanetZooGame 
Instagram: @PlanetZooGame 

Planet Zoo © 2024 Frontier Developments plc. All rights reserved.
